name: Hungry Lumpry
description:
Controls: A - Move left,  D - Move right, W - Move up

                     Left - Move left,  Right - Move right, Up - Jump

This is a strategy game in this game u are a player called lumpry and you have to win levels to eat so your player can survive in my game what matters is speed and concentration in my game there are many clues hidden objects secret bases, potions and many, many more to explore you have over 5 hard levels to participate in every level it gets harder and harder now in this game jam i used the theme breakfast the theme breakfast happens every a couple of seconds (depends on the level you are) the hunger goes down by 2 you have to win levels and gain food so your player which is called lumpry doesn't get hungry. And watch out there are many hidden traps and hidden potions in the game.

Thank you for playing my game :) Have fun and good luck winning
